about_the_game:
Harrowlands is a medieval fantasy colony sim where you guide your settlement through the ever-changing world of Elderath. Experience the everyday lives, struggles, and triumphs of your inhabitants—each with their own backstory, traits, and destiny.

Choose your story

  • Begin as fugitives who’ve narrowly escaped a reaver’s keep, or as mutated survivors from a forbidden sacrificial rite. Your settlement’s origin is up to you.

Core Features

  • Three Unique Races
    Humans, Sylrions, and Azuurans—each with distinctive traits, temperaments, and cultures. Watch how these diverse groups interact, forge friendships, or fuel rivalries as they cohabitate in your settlement.

  • Rich Character Lore
    Every inhabitant has a detailed backstory, special affinities, and unique abilities—shaping how they work, fight, and socialize.

  • Massive Procedurally Generated World
    Build, explore, and adapt to diverse mystical biomes. The landscape changes with each playthrough, offering limitless replayability.

  • Kingdom System & Recurring Threats
    Brace for reaver raids, navigate imperial demands during events like the Sovereign Reign, and decide whether to befriend or antagonize court mages, inquisitors, and other factions.

  • Trade & Diplomacy
    Engage with traveling merchants, neighboring villages, imperial outposts, or secretive underground societies like the Venom Vault. Balance alliances or exploit them.

  • Crafting & Customization
    Collect or create hundreds of magical weapons, equipment, consumables, and books. Customize your settlement to bolster your inhabitants’ powers and resilience.

  • Unlock Unique Buildings
    Construct specialized structures that enhance social bonds, improve comfort and magical training, or ramp up production to generate wealth and powerful gear.

  • Quest & Conquer
    Embark on heroic quests to rescue prisoners and vanquish monsters—or walk a darker path by raiding villages, colluding with reavers, and serving the emperor.

  • Ancient Temples & Legendary Loot
    Delve into hidden ruins filled with formidable creatures and precious artifacts.

  • Comprehensive modding support
    Dedicated modding framework and integration, allowing players to enhance gameplay experience in a way that best suits their needs.

Overall

Encounter the strange quirks of the Sylrions, who draw on the spirit essence of others to bolster their own powers. Discover the innate Azuuran gift for nurturing all forms of plant life, leading to thriving farms and arcane gardens. Build a community where Humans utilize their adaptability and ingenuity to keep pace with the world’s magic-infused challenges. Every settlement is a tapestry of intersecting backgrounds, forging stories that reflect your leadership and shape the fate of Elderath.

Whether you choose harmony or dominion, Harrowlands offers a vast sandbox of possibilities for you to explore and shape—one settlement at a time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670K (quad-core) / AMD® Ryzen™ 3 2200G (quad-core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 (2 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ HD 7850 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Harrowlands is a medieval fantasy colony sim where you shape a thriving settlement in a vast, mystical realm. Master intricate base-building mechanics and guide your inhabitants through the complex social bonds that define their world.
